channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Farmers' Almanac predicts 'old-fashioned' winter. What to expect in Tennessee for 2025-2026
Hackers post 43 gigabytes of St. Paul data after city refuses to pay ransom
Ford recalls over 103,000 US vehicles over damaged axle bolts, NHTSA says
A $2,500 interceptor drone built to destroy Iranian Shaheds was recorded flying at the speed of a bullet train
Hamas hostage videos silenced Israeli media's talk of Gaza aid crisis
Trump names new BLS head after firing old commissioner amid weak jobs report

item.title: Shohei Ohtani, agent sued over $240 million Hawaii real estate project
item.description: A Hawaii real estate investor and broker are suing Shohei Ohtani, claiming the L.A. Dodgers superstar and his agent got them fired from a $240 million...

item.title: General testifies he didn't hear L.A. protests described as "rebellion"
item.description: Three officials involved in President Trump's controversial L.A. National Guard deployment testified in court Monday.

item.title: "Glacial outburst" flooding threat prompts disaster declaration in Alaska

item.title: Coast Guard suspends search for fisherman after boat with 4 crew members capsizes
item.description: The United States Coast Guard has suspended the search for a missing fisherman after a vessel with four people on it capsized in 7-foot swells off the...

item.title: Zelenskyy says Putin 'definitely' not preparing to end war despite Trump summit
item.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy claimed on Tuesday that Russian President Vladimir Putin is preparing for "new offensive operations."

item.title: WATCH: Supreme Court formally asked to overturn landmark same-sex marriage ruling
item.description: Ten years after the U.S. Supreme Court extended marriage rights to same-sex couples, the justices will consider for the first time whether to take up ...

item.title: WATCH: Welcome to Emmy the Labrador's neighborhood
item.description: A Labrador in Southern California has gone viral on TikTok after her owner trained her to ring a special doorbell so she can visit their neighbors.

item.title: Cops bust "spiritual retreat" offering frog venom, hallucinogenic drugs
item.description: Officers seized 11 liters of ayahuasca, 117 San Pedro cactus plants and several bottles of frog venom known as Kambo.

item.title: Trump's remarks on homelessness in DC spark concerns among homeless advocates
item.description: President Donald Trump vowed this week to rid Washington, D.C., of homeless encampments, though what those plans will look like are unclear.

item.title: Officials are still investigating the cause of a Pennsylvania steel plant explosion that killed 2
item.description: Officials are still working to determine the cause of an explosion that rocked a steel plant outside Pittsburgh, leaving two dead and 10 injured.
